name: abstractApi
title: Abstract API
description: Automate routine dev work with Abstract's suite of APIs
author: andreaselia

commands.name: ip-geolocation
commands.title: IP Geolocation
commands.subtitle: Abstract API
commands.description: The IP Geolocation allows you to look up the location, timezone, country details, and more of an IPv4 or IPv6 address.

commands.name: timezone
commands.title: Timezone
commands.subtitle: Abstract API
commands.description: The Time, Date, and Timezone API is the easiest way to find, convert, and manage time and timezone data across the world.

commands.name: avatars
commands.title: Avatars
commands.subtitle: Abstract API
commands.description: The User Avatar API, like all of Abstract's APIs, is organized around REST. It is designed to use predictable, resource-oriented URL's and to use HTTP status codes to indicate errors.

commands.name: screenshot
commands.title: Screenshot
commands.subtitle: Abstract API
commands.description: Abstract's Website Screenshot API is a simple yet powerful REST API that allows you to request an image of a given URL.
